abstract: There’s more bad news for Kenneth C. Griffin’s Citadel Investment Group: The counterparty credit ratings for two of its hedge funds were cut Tuesday by Standard & Poor’s because of market losses.
lead_paragraph: There’s more bad news for Kenneth C. Griffin’s Citadel Investment Group: The counterparty credit ratings for two of its hedge funds were cut Tuesday by Standard & Poor’s because of market losses.

headline.main: S.&P. Cuts Its Ratings on 2 Citadel Hedge Funds

abstract: Do you have any stocks that are up this year? In the S&P. 500, there are only 16 of them, making this a year of bad breadth unlike any in memory.
snippet: Do you have any stocks that are up this year? In the S&P. 500, there are only 16 of them, making this a year of bad breadth unlike any in memory.
lead_paragraph: This year is shaping up as the worst one in memory for the stock market, at least in terms of breadth.
